meanings.definition: The state of being gone or absent.
meanings.sent1: Her sudden gonenesses left us feeling lonely.
meanings.sent2: The gonenesses of the missing keys puzzled everyone.
meanings.sent3: The gonenesses of the cookies made the kids search the whole house.
meanings.sent4: The gonenesses of the sun at night always brings a sense of peace.
meanings.sent5: The gonenesses of the old tree in the yard made the garden feel empty.

meanings.definition: The quality of being no longer present or in existence.
meanings.sent1: The gonenesses of the old building was evident in the empty lot.
meanings.sent2: The sudden gonenesses of the internet connection was frustrating.
meanings.sent3: The gonenesses of the last slice of cake made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The gonenesses of childhood innocence is a bittersweet memory.
meanings.sent5: The gonenesses of the stars in the morning sky signaled the start of a new day.
